page.title: 01BELLINGHAM
page.content: Bellingham is a small town set in beautiful country side.It has a population of about 1100 and is mainly a farming community.There are some shops,three churches,a library,a health centre and two schools.The school is one of the hubs of the community being used for everything from evening classes to sporting activities.The majority of business is bound to agriculture.A mart is held at regular intervals,this is a social event for many.The river North Tyne runs along the southern edge of the town.There are many interesting walks around Bellingham.Of particular interest is the walk to Hareshaw Lynn which has a fine waterfall.Every year in August Bellingham Show is held on the last Saturday in August.The centre of the town is Manchester Square where each year a town fair is held.
